page.title: 18Danson Park
page.content: There are lots of things for people to do.There are two gardens_the Old English Garden and the Rockery_where children are not allowed on their own.They are mostly for old people who like to sit in peace and quiet. There is a large artificial lake,where you can fish,row,hire a peddle boat or have a ride on a paddle-steamer. Most people use the park for fun or walking the dog.There are twenty tennis courts,a bowling green,pitch and put,football and rugby pitches. In July they have the Bexley Show.The main feature is the horticultural show,but there are many side shows run by many charities.Some stalls are run by car manufacturers. The arena is set aside for displays.There is also a fair and the atmosphere is one of great fun for all the family.
